Egluryn phraethineb. sebh, dosparth ar retoreg, vn oʻr saith gelbhydhyd, yn dysculhuniaith ymadrodh, aʻi pherthynassau [Perry, Henry]. Salesbury, William, 1520?-1600?
[20], 103, [5] p.
Printiedig gann Ioan Danter yn Lhundain, [London] : 1595.
Dedication signed: Henricus Perræus. "A Welsh treatise on rhetoric, the outlines of which had previously been written by William Salesbury"--DNB. Includes index. Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Wales.
=======

[20], 103, [5] p.
Printiedig gann Ioan Danter yn Lhundain, [London] : 1595.
Dedication signed: Henricus Perræus. "A Welsh treatise on rhetoric, the outlines of which had previously been written by William Salesbury"--DNB. Includes index. Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Wales.
